Searching career in the intersection of statistics, web and programming. ::: ::: resume-contact ::: row {{< fa envelope size=lg title="Email:" >}} [raju.rimal@medisin.uio.no](mailto:raju.rimal@medisin.uio.no) [rimalraju@hotmail.com](mailto:rimalraju@hotmail.com) ::: ::: row {{< fa globe size=lg title="Homepage:" >}} [https://mathatistics.com](https://mathatistics.com) ::: --- ::: row [{{< fa brands orcid size=xl title="Orcid:" >}}](https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6097-0285) [{{< fa brands twitter size=xl title="Twitter:" >}}](https://twitter.com/mathatistics) [{{< fa brands facebook size=xl title="Facebook:" >}}](https://facebook.com/mathatistics) [{{< fa brands linkedin size=xl title="LinkedIn:" >}}](https://linkedin.com/in/therimalaya) [{{< fa brands github size=xl title="GitHub:" >}}](https://github.com/therimalaya) [{{< fa brands instagram size=xl title="Instagram:" >}}](https://instagram.com/therimalaya) [{{< fa brands researchgate size=xl title="Research Gate:" >}}](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Raju-Rimal-2) [{{< fa brands stack-overflow size=xl title="Stack Overflow:" >}}](https://stackoverflow.com/users/1987629/therimalaya) ::: --- ::: row {{< fa id-card size=lg title="Stack Overflow:" >}} Driving licence class B ::: ::: ::: ::: {.panel-fill .resume-body} ## Experiences ::: panel-tabset ### Research

University of Oslo

Norwegian University of Life Sciences

- University of Oslo, Faculty of Medisin - Oslo, Norway - Postdoctoral Fellow, Department of Biostatistics - Nov 2020 -- Now - Analyzing the trend of melanoma incidence and survival by tumour thickness in Norway overall and within different prognostic factors such as sex, age, anatomic site, and melanoma subtypes. ### Consulting & Advising ::: ::: panel-tabset ### Teaching ### Teaching Assistant ### IT Support ::: ## Education ::: panel-tabset ### Dissertations and Publications ### Conference Participation ::: ::: panel-tabset ### Academic Qualifications ::: ## Skills ::: panel-tabset ### IT skills ### Scientific skills ### Interpersonal skills ::: ## Interests & Hobbies I like hiking, cycling, and photography. In my free time I also play lego and make crafts together with my son. I like programming and like to explore new programming language ## Language ::: panel-tabset ### Nepali ### English ### Hindi ### Norwegian ::: :::
